name: nocodb
description: NocoDB turns your database into a smart spreadsheet-like UI. It supports CRUD, filters, plugins, and workflows, enabling users to build apps and internal tools without coding in a self-hosted environment.
features: Database to spreadsheet: Transform MySQL, PostgreSQL, SQL Server, or SQLite databases into spreadsheet interfaces.
Grid view: Edit database records in a familiar spreadsheet-like grid with sorting and filtering.
Form views: Generate web forms automatically from database tables for data collection.
Gallery view: Display records as cards with images for visual data browsing.
Kanban boards: Organize records in kanban columns based on status or category fields.
API generation: Automatically create REST and GraphQL APIs for all database tables.
Collaboration: Share bases with team members and control access with role-based permissions.
Webhooks: Trigger external actions when data changes with configurable webhook endpoints.
Automation: Create workflows that respond to data events with actions and notifications.
App store: Extend functionality with plugins for Slack, Teams, Discord, and more.
Import/export: Load data from CSV, Excel, or JSON and export in multiple formats.
Self-hosted control: Run on your infrastructure with support for Docker, Kubernetes, or bare metal.
